media:group.media:title: Steins;Gate : the Butterfly Effect
media:group.media:description:
I have tried very hard to avoid any obvious spoilers for those who don't know the story yet. This means that I couldn't talk in detail about some important themes that happen later into the game, without having to give away major plot details. I hope you still enjoy my overview of the Steins;Gate world and what it means to me.

I discovered today an excellent video called "Steins;Gate Unlocked" on the channel Beyond Ghibli: https://youtu.be/pQpOz3KVK_s
I enjoyed it very much and do recommend it!
Just in case you think this is an odd coincidence (it is - but then, lots of videos have been made about Steins;Gate) - I've been working on my video the last 3 weeks. ðŸ˜Ž

Steins;Gate is rated M (Mature 17+) by the ESRB. My video is therefore NOT suitable for children as per the COPPA legislation.
